join_text: This server is ran by Elite-HunterZ.com You can join our Discord at https://discord.elite-hunterz.com Find us easily in the server browser by filtering for: hunterz
advertisements: Find us easily in the server browser by filtering for: hunterz
Give us your suggestions with: <color=#ff0000>!suggest your thoughts here
type !rank to see your rank on this server
type !top to see the top 10 players on this server
type !rtv if you want to change the map before the time runs out
